audit_notes: 2026-01-29: Cabin-by-cabin verification via CruiseDeckPlans. Deck 8 lifeboat obstructions, deck 11 balcony privacy issues verified.
methodology: Individual cabin verification via cruisedeckplans.com stateroom-details lookup. 404 responses indicate non-existent cabins.
trust_note: Verified via CruiseDeckPlans individual cabin lookups. Jewel class ship with Haven suites.

exceptions.notes: Deck 8 handicap-accessible oceanview cabins with 100% obstructed views due to lifeboats
Category MB aft mini suites on deck 11 have partitions that go up at an angle and offer very little privacy

category_overrides._verification_note: Cabin categories verified via individual page lookups. Jewel class ship (built 2007).
